info.description: It's same new Twitter, except much cleaner and little bit better. üê¶ Changes white background color to light blue (only enabled in white theme), removes annoying elements such as trends, promoted tweets, "who to follow" boxes (and more with recommended uBlock filterlist!) and other really minor tweaks. Read the notes at the bottom.
info.additionalInfo: [Screenshot with "Increase color contrast" accessibility setting enabled] Also available at Greasy Fork and Github. Use these sites instead of Userstyles.org! This userstyle can't remove everything because limitations of current CSS and complexity of layout. So I also made uBlock filterlist that removes even more elements, that are harder to do otherwise. Click here to see the filterlist ‚óã First, if you haven't already, install uBlock Origin: Chrome extension or Firefox extension    ‚ö† Uninstall Adblock Plus and other similar adblockers! Only one adblocker is necessary! More info here ‚óã Then: How to import manually a filterlist ‚óã Also, you can copy the filter rules and add manually to uBlock Origin if you want, but you miss updates. This userstyle and filterlist works ONLY with default english language (I'm not adding support for other languages). Works best with white theme, but other themes are partially supported for element blocks.
